title: Can we please lose less LP if a player is AFK for 50% of a game?
body:
It's frustrating when a player on your team doesn't connect, or connects then 5 minutes in "gtg, dinner!".
It's a real kick in the nuts to lose 20LP when you lost because of an AFK (and riots own research backs up the damage an AFK has on the game).

Couldn't be soften the blow by if a player is AFK for more than 50% of the game, or even 75% that we lose less LP?

replies.body: I can only suggest not starting a game in the 5:45-6:30 time as most people be having dinner during or with in game time of these times.

Hey,
Unfortunately that is not something healthy for the game, as then one person from a pair can take turns disconnecting in order to lose less lp, this would however lead to a ban though. I know it sucks to lose a game because of AFKS, but assuming you don't afk, the enemy has a higher chance of an afk then you do. Hopefully you don't get any AFKS and have a great day.

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn
people would feel like its a loss early into game and afk to lose less points
nah, If that was possible i would be afk 80% of my games
I probably should have mentioned that the afk should lose full LP, and potentially to avoid teams coming in with dummy accounts to afk with, anyone queued with the afk would also lose full LP.
